original_title: その男、エロにつき アデュ〜! 久保新二伝
overview: A docu-drama depicting half the life of actor Shinji Kubo, who has appeared in over 800 pink movies, with laughter, tears, and plenty of eros. Although he fulfilled his promise to "become an actor" with his classmate Yoko, who was...
title: Amorous Man Shinji
